articles.title: Sandman’s Cain and Abel weren’t inspired by the Bible but by DC Comics - Polygon
articles.description: It’s easy to assume that the biblical brothers Cain and Abel in Netflix’s Sandman are from Genesis — but you’d be dead wrong. They’re actually inspired by Tales From the Crypt.
